page.title: 12Education In Tolworth
page.content: I go to Tolworth Girls School. It is a school for girls between the ages of 11 to 18.The uniform is navy blue.Rules about the uniform are very strict.The girls come from:Tolworth, Chessington,Kingston,Worcester Park.Nearby is a boys school called Southborough.Fleetwood and Hollyfield are the two mixed schools.There are also some privat schools(fee paying schools)such as Surbiton High Girls school.There are many junior schools:e.g St. Andrews and St.Marks,St. Pauls,St. Matthews and Malden Manor.Children,to get placed in a secondary school are tested when they are in their last year of Junior school. This test is called the "eleven plus". If you pass this you go to either of the two selective schools: Tiffin Boys or Tiffin Girls.
